    • Method Detail

      • getWSDL

        javax.wsdl.Definition getWSDL(java.lang.String accessPointKey,
                              java.util.Properties properties)
                       throws GException
        Returns the WSDL of the port. The returned WSDL document contains WSDL port embedded under Service element.
        Parameters:
        accessPointKey - unique key identifying this access point
        properties - are optional. Could be used to include dependent objects.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        GException

      • saveWSDL

        void saveWSDL(java.lang.String accessPointKey,
              javax.wsdl.Definition definition,
              boolean update)
       throws GException
        Update WSDL port in system metadata store.
        Parameters:
        accessPointKey - unique key identifying this access point
        definition - containing WSDL port embedded under Service element.
        Throws:
        GException

      • deleteWSDL

        boolean deleteWSDL(java.lang.String accessPointKey)
            throws GException
        Deletes WSDL port from system metadata store.
        Parameters:
        accessPointKey - unique key identifying this access point
        Returns:
        true if resource was deleted
        Throws:
        GException
